website_summaries.verdict: Uses only natural ingredients, including chondroitin, turmeric, and others to help with inflammation. Claims to help with dogs with joint pain among other things.
pros: Owners like the natural ingredients with no corn, soy, or wheat
Dog owners report the soft chews allow their dogs to be more active
Formula seems to work especially well with older dogs suffering with joint pain
cons: Some owners report the size of each chew varies, causing dosage issues
Some picky eaters may not like the taste

website_summaries.verdict: Made with glucosamine, chondroitin, MSM, turmeric, and more. Natural, holistic, and made in the USA combine to make this a great option to alleviate hip and joint pain, or prevent it in the first place.
pros: Certified by the National Animal Supplement Council
Owners report how their dogs love the taste, which makes consumption that much easier
cons: Some dog owners have trouble with their picky eaters eating the treats

customer_reviews.title: She loves them!
customer_reviews.text: As Winnie has gotten older, she’s slowed down a bit. I talked to my veterinarian about what we can do to help and he told me to get some sort of glucosamine for dogs. Found these on Amazon and have been extremely satisfied. Winnie begs for them every day since she likes them so much! I highly recommend them to anyone with an older dog or those with a breed that often has hip issues
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Raftery

customer_reviews.title: Our morning walks are getting better and he seems to be much more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Started giving this to my dog Gus who is 11 years old and having hip problems. We have been taking this for about 2 weeks and it seems to be helping. Our morning walks are getting better and he seems to be much more comfortable. No problem getting him to gobble them right up. I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wooflicious
customer_reviews.text: I have been having some hip problems so my hooman got me. They are delicious. They are soft and moist, my other ones were hard and crunchy. Now that I am getting older, I prefer the soft bits. Thank you, woof woof
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Barber

customer_reviews.title: my dog seems to get around so much better by using this
customer_reviews.text: my dog seems to get around so much better by using this, labs and dogs like her have hip and joint problems as they age and this product really helps
customer_reviews.author: Berley Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old golden whom the vet thought might’ve had a slightly torn ACL. Before going the surgery route, I wanted to see if there was something that could help. Long story short, while I doubt the vet’s diagnosis, this supplement has seemed to improve her hips/knees. I am now on my second order and the dog is a huge fan. I will continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dani R.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is terribly off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set to use one for my 63 lb airedale, who was recovering from surgery. Yes, I measured his paw, which was supposed to be a size 5. It looked a little low on the leg but, how should I know. I secured it to his paw, and even gave a tug. I let him out to do his business. Lo and behold, in under 10 minutes he was back without the boot. I can't find it and am out $35 and now have a set for a 3 legged dog.
customer_reviews.author: Te.

customer_reviews.title: We've found that this product has worked as well if not better than the competing one
customer_reviews.text: We chose this over another similar product which our Vet had sold us at twice the cost of this one. We've found that this product has worked as well if not better than the competing one. Our 17yo pit is acting spry as a puppy again and no more accidents due to her arthritis impacting her ability to go potty. WIN WIN for both of us! We've even starting giving to our 7 yo boxer just because. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so they must taste good. (I haven't tried them
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 dogs use these as a supplement to keep them healthy. They eagerly await them, so they must taste good. (I haven't tried them! ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Nic Tag

customer_reviews.title: Works for stiff joints.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought numerous vitamins for my 9 year old dog who has problems with his joints and getting up and down. A friend recommended this and within two weeks could see a difference. Then we went away for a week on vacation and forgot to tell the sitters to give it to him. Came home to find him stiff again and started him back up on the pills that same day. It doesn’t cure all, as he still has trouble, but you can for sure see a difference. Have tried probably 6 other brands plus an oil, and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy S.

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing but make my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. These seemed to have no effect on my dog at all whatsoever aa far as motility in her joints hut they did make her sick. Vomiting sick. She doesn't have allergies or food sensitivity so I'm not sure why but when she started these she went off her food, her energy tanked, she was more lethargic and she was not herself. No change in her joint movements either. We stopped for a month and she was back to her regular self. Started again, same thing. I thought about returning these but decided to give them to a family member who wanted to try them with their dog. I will update if I get any feedback from them.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I received these chews a few weeks ago for my 11 year old Border Collie with severe arthritis and joint pain. After giving him the chews, he is now moving a little more freely. He has also been offering to walk a little more. Plus, he loves the taste! They're just like a treat to him.
customer_reviews.author: Dasherbordercollie

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the taste and I love the results!! This is a great product for dogs with arthritis!! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shereen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seems to help the up/down that my older dogs were having trouble with
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love these and it seems to be helping their mobility. I started with one and just purchased 2 more. With 3 large dogs, the 150 count container is only 25 days wroth of supplement since it is 2 a day for the initial phase when starting them on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to feed my picky eating dog
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd Dog is now 11 and has been on hip joint medications for several years all ready. I have tried a few other medications prior to buying this one. His previous medication was no longer available so I purchased this one. I like the convenience of the Soft Chews. I merely crumble them into his food bowl. Other products he would eat around. These he likes and eats them readily. I have been using them for a month now and they are as effective as other products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: So glad we found these because they contain just the right ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are 11 years old and for the past couple of years we have been trying different products which contain Glucosamine and Chondroitin to help their hips and joints as they age. The products we've tried have been expensive and needed more than one pill for their size and weight. So glad we found these because they contain just the right amount of everything to help keep our dogs active and healthy. They must be very tasty also because the dogs sit and beg for one in the morning as soon as we get up. Great price and wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Former Marine or his wife

customer_reviews.title: at 2 yrs old diagnosed with severe hip displasia
customer_reviews.text: Buddy is a rescue dog a red retreiver he started limping at 1 1/2 years old had him xrayed and found that the ball in his left rear leg is far smaller than the socket . vet said to limit his playtime and to give cosiquin,which we did with little results so we went to dosaquin and he got a little better but the cost is extremely high so we are now trying this and hope he finds relief soon he loves the taste so we'll see time is the only true answer .
customer_reviews.author: barbara d.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old Lab with bad arthritis. Who has, unfortunately, with his growing aliments, he's become a very finicky eater. I have tried so many types of Glucosamine Treats without success. But he just GOBBLES these down!!!! In fact, the only time he won't eat them, is if he's having a particularly bad day. And they really do help. If I keep him on a regular schedule w/ these... I've noticed he has less trouble getting up. Also, the container last MUCH LONGER than most. A very good value for the money. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Our beagle babes love these hip and joint treats
customer_reviews.text: Our beagle babes love these hip and joint treats! Since they are both senior dogs, the softer texture is perfect for their teeth and enjoyment. Apparently they can smell them from across the house too and won't miss out on this tasty treat! Not only do my girls adore the treats, but they are healthy for their hips and joints too...which makes mom and dad happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like the taste too much, but his limp has subsided.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for an 8 year old Lab who was starting to slow down.
customer_reviews.text: He was becoming reluctant to jump up into my truck and had to be bribed to even try. Now his willingness to 'Mount up" is back to normal, his energy for 'fetch' is back to a normal level, and his desire to run on the beach has returned. We've only been using this product for a week on half a dose for his size (nearly 100 lbs.) We will be continuing this regimen for the foreseeable future as he is expectant and eager for his morning 'treat'.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Update! My 70 lb English Shepherd tore his ACL, and instead of surgery, I chose PT & doubled this supplement. Fantastic results so far! I have 3 dogs with joint problems & all 3 are in perfect shape again after just 1 month on this supplement! I have 2 large dogs & 1 small dog, so for the small dog, I just cut them in thirds
customer_reviews.author: ts0215

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loved them!....too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 120lb Great Dane mix and he thoroughly enjoyed the flavor. So much that after a few weeks of having them he managed to get the bottle down, destroy it and finish off the chews. They seemed to be helping him, but that's hard to confirm since he didn't make it through a whole bottle over the correct time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D Goodman

customer_reviews.title: She’s way better than before and acts like a puppy again
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd had some mobility issues. If she laid down for a while, she had some trouble getting up. Her vet suggested getting her on glucosamine for the stiffness. The improvement was very quick. She’s way better than before and acts like a puppy again. I’ll continue buying these supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Reamonn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Approved by 100 Pound GSD
customer_reviews.text: Our Tatze is going to be 8 this year, and we've noticed she sometimes has a hard time sitting on non-carpeted flooring. She has been eating these chews for about 10 days now and she sits much easier. She was taking Cosequin, but it didn't seem to help. These, she enthusiastically gobbles up and I've noticed her sitting with a little more ease. Tatze very much approves of these joint chews, and as her hooman, I do too!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Results hard to tell
customer_reviews.text: These chews appear to provide some help for my dog. She is 14 years old and has very bad joint pain. In that animals seem to treat pain differently than humans, determining the chews actual effect on their pain is very hard for me to see. Sometimes she looks good, sometimes not.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! My dog has taken the chews for a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My dog has taken the chews for a little over a week, and she really likes them! Product as described.
customer_reviews.author: THalver

customer_reviews.title: helped reverse joint pain in my older dog
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my dog daily for a few weeks now and I can already see an improvement in him. He's 11 years old and lately has yelped in pain when jumping down from the couch. The yelping has now gone away and I'm pleasantly shocked at how quickly he improved. He loves the flavor, too, and get so excited when it's time to take it. These are definitely a winner
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product on my 7 yr old dog the past year and she no longers limps or struggles after playing hard. It really has worked for her. This is the best supplement I have found so far. I crumble one & mix in her food daily and she eats it without any problem. Read the ingredients compared to what you get from other joint supplements. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Madi Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My chocolate lab has better motor skills after just a week of this great tasting snack. he loves them and I love him. Just one of the many things you can give your dog to relieve muscle problems and arthritic issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Three Dogs --- we've been using this for a year now!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the taste! When I stop taking it, my 2 senior beagles start to have trouble walking up steps. They get slow in their roll too! Within days of restocking this, they're back with some pep in their step!
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: It helps and my dog will eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large, 150 lb. 10 year old dog that was struggling to jump into my SUV to go to the area where we walk every day. She would not use a ramp or steps, and I can't lift her. She is a very picky eater and refuses other joint additives that I've tried. She eats these easily. Has been on them for about 6 months and I saw noticeable improvements within the first month. She doesn't hesitate to jump into or out of the SUV and is still able to enjoy her walks. It didn't make her young again, but it certainly has helped her mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Sagebrush

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with contents spilled into shipping bag. Open container.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with contents emptied into shipping bag. Open container. Looked like some drying had occurred. Not acceptable. Supplement may be good or bad - I'm not feeding my dog food that arrives spilled into a shipping bag.
customer_reviews.author: cascades

customer_reviews.title: Good for mild joint needs
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these . I break them because they are sticky and get stuck in his teeth. Makes him hyper . And he still needs cosequin glucosamine. Tried him with just these and his pain and stiffness was bad . He had hip dysplasia since age 1 yr 😞
customer_reviews.author: angie treadway

customer_reviews.title: jasperboy
customer_reviews.text: no more pain meds. more mobility. he seems a lot happier. so far I love this product
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My older dog is 1/2 Bassett Hound & 1/2 chocolate Lab. His body is that of the Bassett Hound, so he’s 70lbs. & Shad the funky legs of the breed. This product seems to make his back and front legs not bother him nearly as bad as the did before I started giving it to him.
customer_reviews.author: muleladycm

customer_reviews.title: my hooman is so nice she's buying me this fancy chew
customer_reviews.text: From Buddy: Hello everyone, I'm turning 2 soon. Oh, my hooman is so nice she's buying me this fancy chew. It tastes so good I'm willing to learn any trick just to get it. She said it's good for me because I'm some kind of Wiener mix that usually have back & hip problem because of my long sexy back. Get your hooman to buy it for you too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goid value
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, no way to tell if it's doung anything ad my dog wd not showing any signs of joint issues. She is only 45lbs so I give her 1/2 a chew daily after initial 4 weeks of 1 chew daily.
customer_reviews.author: KIM BESCH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog started showing age related joint prob so search tried a couple and without peanut butter he wouldn’t eat them ordered paw struck and he loves them, has decreased difficulty with stairs now
customer_reviews.author: cheryl savage

customer_reviews.title: I think this supplement has been very therapeutic for my little dog.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 1/2 pounds Shihtzu was really having problems with steps and seemed.hesitant to walk and would not trot or run at all. After.anoit 4 weeks of administering this product she is back.to her old self. She runs up the porch steps and onto the sofa beside me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insure of freshness
customer_reviews.text: They must taste good because my dog eats them. Some times an order will be most and chewy, while others come dry. I'm curious as to how long these containers are on your shelves before they get shipped out to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Soft chewy and easy to break apart.
customer_reviews.text: So fra our 9 year old, nine pound dog will eat these. So 5 stars for making them tasty to her. I can only assume they will be as effective as a different brand that I had to disguise to get her to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Bird

customer_reviews.title: Saw fast results
customer_reviews.text: Senior dog, noticed a pretty fast response to these supplements. I noticed the measurements/ingredients, better than the others. Also, you don't have to give 5 to 6 to a bigger dog. These are dosed for 2 daily. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mingarelle

customer_reviews.title: Our dog likes these soft chews
customer_reviews.text: Our big girl, 11 yr old Gordon setter, is struggling to get her back end up. In my opinion I see her with a bit more mobility. I will order another go round of this hip and joint supplement. There's the added benefit, our Gordon loves these. They're a soft chew I can press hard pill medicine into the supplement. If it turned out she didn't get any health benefit from this supplement she loves them for treats. One right after the other. Contents were good so I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs adores these. They’re moist and soft and he loves that. Our dog doesn’t have any health problems but I’m using it as preventative care after trying the skin & coat vitamins as well and immediately seeing results for our dogs paw pads and ears. Highly recommend all pawstruck products.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Draper Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these supplements. Chewy and delicious for them.. love Pawstruck customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Dog is better off!
customer_reviews.text: We were using Dasaquin, which was much more expensive, to treat some arthritis in our aging pooch. Turns out, this is $20 less with all the same key ingredients and the same effectiveness. Happy to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stenhaug

customer_reviews.title: Pooch sort of likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Still too early to see if this supplement will really help with strengthening joints, but has all the essential herbs to support this. Our pooch doesn’t gobble it immediately but eventually eats it. Notice it gets a bit sticky and gooey when left out, but is gone when I return.
customer_reviews.author: Ben McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Have them on subscription and all my friends buying them. My dog is a new dog and when we stopped for a time I could tell. We won’t do that again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them and they helped...for a while
customer_reviews.text: My older dog liked these and they worked well for a while, now he is back to his old, sore self. i will stop them for a while and restart and see if that helps.

customer_reviews.text: No sign of better mobility. Dogs dislike the taste. A chore to get them to eat them
customer_reviews.author: Pupslave

customer_reviews.title: Drugs and vitamins don’t help if you can’t get your dog to eat it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have two large dogs- 50 lbs lab and beagle and a 60 lbs chocolate lab. Both love these and at 15 and 17 both still enjoy their am & pm walks.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs LOVE this supplement! They were started on it when young and without any joint problems...they're still young and without and joint problems...

customer_reviews.title: Not a very healthy inactive ingredient

I don't know why they have to put sucrose in a dog chew and I can understand maybe a little molasses but I'm not satisfied with the inactive ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: No more limpy dogs in the morning.
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving the dogs these supplements in the morning and our 12 year old hound has stopped limping and acting sore. This has totally worked.

customer_reviews.text: The price is decent and the amount of active ingredients are better than most other similar products.

customer_reviews.text: I received my package and it had the paper stuck to them from the packaging. Not giving this to my dog.

customer_reviews.text: My dog is growing older, so I began looking for a product to help him with his aging joints. He really likes these chews and I give them these as rewards during the day, just like a treat. I would recommend these!

customer_reviews.title: Nobody loves you as much as your dog does
customer_reviews.text: Since nobody loves me as much as my dog do I like to feed them tasty (for them!) treats that are good for them. Fortunately my doggos don't have joint issues, but a little preventative doesn't hurt.

customer_reviews.title: After about a week of taking the chews he was walking just fine again! We now give him one a day ...

After about a week of taking the chews he was walking just fine again! We now give him one a day and he loves them! I highly recommend these, especially if you have a large pup.

customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs’ favorite treat and they really make a difference. We’ve noticed that my 3 year old Border Collie doesn’t seem stiff anymore and she has a lot more energy. It took about two weeks to notice the impact but now she’s bounding around with no hesitation.

customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the flavor of these and they have been great for my 9 & 10 year old labs.

customer_reviews.text: These are slightly soft and break apart easily for my puppy. The consistency is similar to a slightly dried up gritty date and they don't smell too bad. I was able to use one treat for about 5 minutes of training and my dog loved it.

customer_reviews.text: My pitbull tore his ccl, wouldn't eat another brand of tablets so I tried these. He loves the taste, eats them fine. Seems to be helping. He isnt limping as much.

customer_reviews.title: My husky berry loved this product
customer_reviews.text: My husky berry loved this product. He is only 11 and started having joint issues when he ran at the beach. The product says it takes time to work, but he was waling different in 2 weeks after this product. The key is to give it to him every singe day and don't miss one.

Definitely the most robust hip/joint supplement that i've found which also happens to be a tasty treat. Misty can be picky about her treats but she loved these ones immediately. Will definitely keep buying these!!

product_meta.title: Pawstruck Natural Hip and Joint Supplement for Dogs in Bulk - Soft Chew Supports Overall Joint Health, Glucosamine for Dogs w/Chondroitin & MSM for Healthy Canines, Made in USA
feature_bullets: Supports healthy joint mobility to help DOGS FEEL YOUNG AGAIN. Daily consumption can aid in alleviating joint discomfort that many dogs experience just by giving them this joint support soft chew. Ask your Veterinarian about making these part of your healthcare routine for older dogs or breeds susceptible to joint issues.

Higher quality means that you need fewer chews to SUPPORT HIP AND JOINT HEALTH AND SKIN AND COAT so your dog lcan look and feel their best. You only need to give your dog 1-2 chews a day. Competitors require up to 6 per day. Ours are packed with glucosamine for dogs and superfoods like turmeric.

MADE W/ NATURAL INGREDIENTS & MADE IN THE USA to ensure the SAFEST possible supplement soft chews. Buy with confidence knowing we hold ourselves to the highest quality standards and only sell products that we use on our own dogs. Additionally, this product is certified safe by the National Animal Supplement Council (NASC). Look for the NASC seal on our packaging!

A flavor that dogs love means this dog supplement is PERFECT FOR PICKY EATERS. If you’re tired of struggling with difficult pills that your dog won’t take, this tasty chew with MSM is perfect for you and your dog.

At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. That’s why we stand behind our 30-day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If these aren’t the best Hip and Joint supplements you’ve ever purchased, our customer care team is ready to help.
